text: @HillaryClinton @yokoboji It’s obvious to anyone with a brain. Hospitals receive More money for Coronavirus Patients. Therefore, people who died ‘With’ the Coronavirus, as well as, people who died ‘Of’ Coronavirus were counted as dying of it.  The numbers are skewed.
